# init(attributedString:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new paragraph with the attributed string you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
init(attributedString: NSAttributedString?)
```

## Parameters

- **attributedString**: An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString].
title: init(attributedString:)
